text: Arau tumi adamara du'i putrara kahinito sihamtaka yathayathabharae barnana karai sunoraa. Yetiya sihamta ubhaye kurabani karaichila, phalata ejanara paraa kabula karaa haichila arau anajanara paraa kabula karaa horaa nachila. Si ka’le, ‘niscaya ma'i tomaka hatya karaima’. Anajane ka’le, ‘niscaya allahe kerala muttakbisakalara paraa'i kabula karae’
